Subject: CAP report shown the count number not correctly
Description:
Hi team,

we have a CAP policy which is used Content detection rule threshold however the CAP report always shown wrong count number. For example:
- policy is block and report
- Ignore threshold is OFF
- file contains 20 emails and 16 phone numbers
- content detection rule threshold: email (20) OR phone (20)
- Sending file is blocked as expected however CAP report only shown count number is 18 and Matched Item shows 16 phone entries and 2 email entries
From my view, the count number must be 20 and matched item should be 20 email entries. 
Could you please explain the CAP report I reported here?
All relevant info in attached file
Regards
Linh
What_We_Know__c:
Created a remote session but Linh did not had time to show up.
Sent note to follow up.
Solution_Comment__c: The client understood the way CAP counts and shows the results (the behaviour is the expected one).
